mention.text: vaca narvaja and roberto cirilo perdia
some 50 journalists gathered in the presidential press room
the journalists that president menem received them and told them that they will enjoy all the rights granted to argentines
the kidnapping of impresario jorge born
the money obtained from the kidnapping of born
a cameramen from a foreign television station
